summary: end of the summer with wizards and demigods
title: end of the summer with wizards and demigods
body:
the summer is slowly coming to an end. all students of hogwarts who spent the past weeks in camp has already made strong friendships, not just with greek demigods, but with romans and other, egyptian magicians (thanks to the visit of the Kanes).

Camp Half-Blood was a diverse, loving and accepting place already, but these events only strengthened it. It was now home for everyone.

Today was Percy’s birthday. The seven woke up early in the morning to make him a huge, blue cake, with candy fishes on it as decoration. They planned to celebrate in the evening, at dinner, so they had to act really netural the whole day. Of course, Percy got all the “Happy birthday, man!” greetings, but it was nothing special.

The sky started to fill up with orange colors as the sun began to hide behind the hill, the demigods were ready for dinner.

The Dining hall was empty, they carried all the tables next to the campfire, where the seven, Reyna, Nico, Harry, Ron, and the others were waiting for Percy.

At first, he didn’t even believe it. He just kept smiling like an idiot, he just hugged and thanked everyone. (Maybe, he bogged down at Harry for a bit too long)

The Little Mermaid soundtrack was on the radio Leo made, the group just laughed and talked for hours. Harry couldn’t look away from Percy, he just seemed so happy it totally amazed him.

Around midnight, Percy decided to get some fresh air, so he walked down to the pier at the lake. Soon, he heard footsteps from behind his back, then saw Harry, silently sitting next to him.

They were silent. They didn’t want to say goodbye yet, to each other, to this summer, to this… thing. Harry struggled with words, tried to say something to the boy, but his feelings were too mixed. They were so good friends, the last thing Harry wanted to do is to ruin it with a stupid confession.

Percy felt unsure at first. Then, he had to accept it: it was now or never.

The kiss was long, deep, filled with all of the emotions and memories of the past six weeks. It was their first meeting and goodbye at the same time. Harry pulled Percy closer, closer and closer, into a tight hug. They stayed there for so long, maybe until dawn, and didn’t care about September coming.

summary: James: We’ve had a lot of pretty good fights, haven’t we? I think we still have a few good ones left in us. What do you think?...
body:
James: We’ve had a lot of pretty good fights, haven’t we? I think we still have a few good ones left in us. What do you think?

Albus: I hope so. 

Ginny from the other side of the room: You guys are hilarious. Just say you love each other!

James and Albus: No we don’t!

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.name: digitalreverse
blog.title: Things that Deny Purpose are Not Worth Dwelling On
blog.description: FFN makes it very difficult to communicate and interact with readers, so I decided to set up shop here, where I will be able to give updates on stories without making you wait for the next chapter or refresh my profile page. Questions, concerns, and ideas can be more easily managed on my part, and I can respond to you quickly, and with a more personal touch. I'm glad to have you here, and welcome to my writing blog.

tags: why am i doing this to myself
summary: BI Book 1: All the Time in the World
title: BI Book 1: All the Time in the World
body:
I should have mentioned this in the post explaining the Becoming Infinite series: I’m referring to all of the books as “BI Book #”, as you can see clearly by the title.

Now onto the actual story info.

  • Harry Potter - Family/Angst - Harry P., Sirius B. (Genres subject to change)
  • Summary: (Not the actual summary) Harry grew up under Sirius Black on muggle streets, as he was a convicted murderer and now child snatcher. The whole time, Sirius is always unhappy, and troubled because of what he made Harry grow up in. Harry can’t bear to see his godfather so upset all the time, and makes it his mission to make his godfather happy, no matter the cost. This includes time traveling, and replacing himself with a Harry that never knew the darkness of the streets.
  • Update Schedule: Whenever I get around to it, really. I have TOWWM as my top priority, and a story I’m working on with my sister on another account, so this may be slow to update.

Hint for anyone who happens to read this that people on FFN won’t get: Each Harry has a unique thing about them. If you can’t tell, this Harry is going to have some unique time talent.

tags: I'm a new writer why am I doing this to myself
title: Becoming Infinite
body: This is going to be a seven book fanfiction series of Harry Potter. Each book will cover a different  Harry Potter from an alternate universe, expect for the seventh in which they all combine. As in, each different Harry is brought to the same universe. Well, that’s what one of them tries to do, but he can’t really. You’ll see in a few years I’m sure.
